note.p: Death: In the vicinity of Aiguille Blanche de Peuteret, an Alpine peak near Cormayeur, Switzerland (18 July 1882)
Education: Harrow School; Trinity College, Cambridge. BA (1873)

Career: Fellow of Trinity College; Lecturer in Animal Morphology, Cambridge (1876); went to Switzerland after having typhoid fever; set out to climb the Aiguille Blanche de Peteret and his body was found a few days later
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1883 vol 35 pp xx-xxvii signed by M F
